items.title: Computer
items.body: A **computer** is a [machine](openitem:yWucUr1nxs) that can be programmed to carry out sequences of arithmetic or logical operations automatically.
items.source: Remixed excerpt from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).

items.title: Machine
items.body: A machine is a man-made device that uses power to apply forces and control movement to perform an action. They can also include [computers](openitem:n56zmSSnLy) and sensors that monitor performance and plan movement, often called mechanical systems.
items.source: Remixed excerpt from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).
